content:
Using the context I provided you before, could you answer the following FAQs to be used as answers for a hotel chatbot. Be professional, helpful and detailed in your answers
FAQS: 
Book a table
Breakfast
Cancellations
Careers
Casino
Check-in
Check-out
Children policy
Closing periods
Contacts
Covid-19
Discounts, Offers and Partnerships
Golf
Kids clubs, Playgrounds, and Entertainment
Location
Manage bookings
Meals plans
Packages
Parking
Restaurants
Room types and views
Spa and Wellness
Swimming pool
Transfers, Shuttles and Car pick-up service
WiFi
